Project1.name: ExpiLibrary
Project1.description: A modern, open-source digital library management system designed to streamline the organization, cataloging, and accessibility of books and resources for libraries of all sizes.

Project2.name: Miyuki
Project2.description: Miyuki is an all-in-one Discord bot built for smarter, smoother, and more engaging servers. It combines moderation, automation, music, utilities, and entertainment in one sleek, customizable package — adapting effortlessly to any community size or style.

content.paragraph2: a space I built for fun — and to show what I can create when I let ideas run wild. This site is a mix of experimentation, code, and creativity, where I test concepts, build tools, and upload team projects that I’m proud of.

content.paragraph1: ExpiProject started as a personal challenge:
content.paragraph2: “Can I make a clean, working project hub from scratch — just for fun?”
content.paragraph3: Turns out, yes. Now it’s become a personal portfolio and a place where I (and sometimes my team) post projects we’re building, learning from, or just messing around with.

content.paragraph1: Keep it simple, real, and fun.
content.paragraph2: I’m not chasing hype or buzzwords — this site is just a living collection of what I’ve built, what I’m learning, and what I’ll build next.

content.paragraph1: I’m MrYapikZ, a developer who loves turning ideas into working code.
content.paragraph2: Sometimes I work solo, sometimes I collaborate with friends — but every project here represents a small step forward in my creative journey.

content.paragraph1: Expect more experiments, side projects, and tech demos.
content.paragraph2: ExpiProject will always evolve — because I’m always learning something new.

Hero.title: Error 404: You Haven’t Messaged Us Yet.
Hero.paragraph1: Don’t let that error persist — fix it by saying hi
Hero.paragraph2: We’re always debugging life and looking for cool humans to build with.
